## RadioBrowserApi.getStationsByClicks() method

Gets stations by clicks. Stations with the highest number of clicks are most popular

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getStationsByClicks(limit?: number, fetchConfig?: RequestInit): Promise<Station[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  limit | number | Limit the number of returned stations |
|  fetchConfig | RequestInit | Fetch configuration |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Station](./radio-browser-api.station.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

Array of stations
